00046 #include <QtGlobal>
00047 #include <QTime>
00048 #include <iostream>
00049 
00050 #include "brisalog.h"
00051 
00052 #define COLOR_DEBUG "\033[32;1m"
00053 #define COLOR_WARN "\033[33;1m"
00054 #define COLOR_CRITICAL "\033[31;1m"
00055 #define COLOR_FATAL "\033[33;1m"
00056 #define COLOR_RESET "\033[0m"
00057 
00058 #define LOG_WRITE(OUTPUT, COLOR, LEVEL, MSG) OUTPUT << COLOR << \
00059                         QTime::currentTime().toString("hhmmsszzz").toStdString() << \
00060                         " " LEVEL " " << COLOR_RESET << MSG << "\n"
00061 
00062 static void brisaMessageWritter(QtMsgType type, const char *msg) {
00063     switch (type) {
00064     case QtWarningMsg:
00065         LOG_WRITE(std::cout, COLOR_WARN, "WARN", msg);
00066         break;
00067     case QtCriticalMsg:
00068         LOG_WRITE(std::cout, COLOR_CRITICAL, "CRIT", msg);
00069         break;
00070     case QtFatalMsg:
00071         LOG_WRITE(std::cout, COLOR_FATAL, "FATAL", msg);
00072         break;
00073     case QtDebugMsg:
00074         LOG_WRITE(std::cout, COLOR_DEBUG, "DEBUG", msg);
00075         break;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void brisaLogInitialize(void) {
00080     qInstallMsgHandler(brisaMessageWritter);
00081 }
